stripped_text: Spend credits only from stealth cards to use this hardware. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1 credit to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2 credits to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
text: Spend credits only from stealth cards to use this hardware. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
title: Mu Safecracker
